query.statement: INSERT INTO CATEGORY ( CATEGORY_NO, CATEGORY_DESC, CATEGORY_NAME, MODIFY_DATE, MODIFY_ID, REG_DATE, REG_ID, USE_YN) VALUES (:vo.categoryNo, :vo.categoryDesc, :vo.categoryName, :vo.modifyDate, :vo.modifyId, :vo.regDate, :vo.regId, :vo.useYn)

UPDATE CATEGORY SET CATEGORY_DESC = :vo.categoryDesc, CATEGORY_NAME = :vo.categoryName, MODIFY_DATE = :vo.modifyDate, MODIFY_ID = :vo.modifyId, REG_DATE = :vo.regDate, REG_ID = :vo.regId, USE_YN = :vo.useYn WHERE CATEGORY_NO = :vo.categoryNo

SELECT category.CATEGORY_NO, category.CATEGORY_DESC, category.CATEGORY_NAME, category.MODIFY_DATE, category.MODIFY_ID, category.REG_DATE, category.REG_ID, category.USE_YN FROM CATEGORY category WHERE category.CATEGORY_NO = :vo.categoryNo

SELECT category.CATEGORY_NO, category.CATEGORY_DESC, category.CATEGORY_NAME, category.MODIFY_DATE, category.MODIFY_ID, category.REG_DATE, category.REG_ID, category.USE_YN FROM CATEGORY category #if ($keywordNum != "") WHERE #if ($condition == "All" || $condition == "") ( category.CATEGORY_NO like :keywordStr or category.CATEGORY_NAME like :keywordStr ) #elseif($condition == "categoryNo") category.CATEGORY_NO like :keywordStr #elseif($condition == "categoryName") category.CATEGORY_NAME like :keywordStr #end #end order by category.CATEGORY_NO
